entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add option to specify environment from testenvironments.json on CLI #29516
  • Microsoft.DotNet.ApiSymbolExtensions binary is missing from the SDK, causing API compat failures in 8.0 #29511

Closed

  • "MSB4018 ResolveTargetingPackAssets task failed unexpectedly" after updating to 7.0.100 #29517
  • Have a bug #29515
  • Mody2838@gmail.com #29492

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29531
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add item template for directory.build.props and directory.build.targets #29526
    Area-Templates, Area-Common templates
  • add class template #29518
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update target framework version in toolsetinfo for NET 8. #29316
  • Update releases-index.json #29445
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update minimum msbuild to 17.4 #29416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for an explicit interface implementation methods #29471
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix typo in GivenTransitiveFrameworkReferencesAreDisabled.cs #29512

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29397
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2066787 #29494
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29341
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix garbage collection for aliased workload packs #29508
    Area-Workloads
